messages.title: He will protect our public services
messages.content: Daniel will fight for our schools and hospitals. He got the NHS privatising department shut down. Labour says big businesses must pay their fair share.

messages.title: A rebel with a cause and that cause is Cambridge
messages.content: Keep a progressive, pro-European Labour MP in Parliament. Daniel always votes to 'Remain' and for voting reform. Whatever the party line is, Daniel puts Cambridge first.

messages.title: He will never prop up a Tory Government
messages.content: Tim Farron’s Lib Dem candidate voted with the Tories 782 times. The Lib Dem leader had a poster of Thatcher in his bedroom but Daniel shares your values. He will stick to his principles, and never sell out.

issues.economy: Labour says big businesses must pay their fair share.
issues.education: Daniel will fight for our schools

leaflet.personalStatement: Daniel Zeichner will always stick to his principles and never sell out.

quotes.text: ABORTION IS WRONG AT ANY TIME, FARRON SAID
I’m a bit of a Eurosceptic
NHS funding crisis hits 'new low' in Tory Government hands
quotes.source: Statement about NHS under Conservative Party

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests tactical voting against Tim Farron's Lib Dems and criticizes their alignment with the Tory party.
